stripped_text: If Disposable HQ is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Disposable HQ, you may add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
text:
If Disposable HQ is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Disposable HQ, you may add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
title: Disposable HQ
